### Read Some Papers
For the readings below, write a **single post** on Slack addressing each question:

```{r echo=FALSE}

paper <- tibble(
  
  title = c("<i>Psychopathic Sims: Testing the Cheater-Hawk Hypothesis in a Video Game</i>",
             "<i>What is the difference between evaluation and research - and why do we care?</i>",
             "<i>What is Evaluation?</i>"
  ),
  
  Source = c("Visser, Batinic, Worth, Book, & Toll (2020)",
              "Mathison (2006)",
              "Davidson (2004)"),
  
  Arrow = c("internal",
            "internal",
            "internal"),
  
  Post = c("Focusing on just the measures, what are your thoughts regarding the validity and reliability of the study?",
            "How is evaluation viewed in your field? Is it generally feared, welcomed, both, neither?",
            "Knowing that there is no set definition of program evaluation, how would you define the term?"),
  
  Channel = c(
    "`#wk1-psychopathic-sims`{=markdown}",
    "`#wk1-#evaluation-views`{=markdown}",
    "`#wk1-#evaluation-definition`{=markdown}"
  ),
  
  Icon = c("slack", 
           "slack",
           "slack"),

  Site = c(
    "https://edp611summer2022.slack.com/archives/C03FB9D0EPQ",
    "https://edp611summer2022.slack.com/archives/C03G45YDD7S",
    "https://edp611summer2022.slack.com/archives/C03FHU1ACHG"
  ),
  
  .name_repair = "minimal"
  
)

```

<center>
```{r, echo=FALSE}
paper %>%
  mutate(Icon = case_when(
    str_detect(`Icon`, "slack") ~ '<img src="/logos/slack-ico.png" alt="Slack icon" width="25px">',
    str_detect(`Icon`, "ecampus") ~ '<img src="/logos/wvu-gold-ico.png" alt="Slack icon" width="25px">',
    str_detect(`Icon`, "library") ~ '<img src="/logos/library-ico.png" alt="Slack icon" width="25px">',
    TRUE ~ NA_character_
    )
  ) %>%
  mutate(Arrow = case_when(
    str_detect(`Arrow`, "external") ~ '<div style="font-size: 0.5rem;"><i class="fa fa-external-link fa-2x" aria-hidden="true" style="color:#559977"></i></div>',
    TRUE ~ NA_character_
    )
  ) %>%
  mutate(Site = na_if(Site, "")) %>%
  mutate(Link = case_when(
    !is.na(Icon) ~ paste0("<a href=",Site," target='_blank'>",Icon,"</a>"),
    TRUE ~ NA_character_
    )
  ) %>%
  mutate(Channel = paste0("<span style='font-size:20px'>",Channel,"</span></a>")) %>%
  select(-Icon, -Site, -Arrow) %>% 
  mutate_all(replace_na,"") %>%
  kbl(col.names = c("Title", "Paper", "Question", "Post", "Link"), 
      "html", 
      escape = FALSE,
      align = 'lllc') %>%
  kable_paper(full_width = TRUE) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "20em") %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "10em") %>%
  column_spec(3, width = "30em") %>% 
  row_spec(0:3, extra_css = 'vertical-align: middle !important;', color = "#f7f7f7", background = "transparent") %>%
  column_spec(4, width = "10em", color = "#ff8384") 
```
</center>

### Read Some Text

```{r echo=FALSE}

document <- as.character(fa("file", fill = "#e86af0", height = "25px"))

book <- as.character(fa("book", fill = "#f06ab5", height = "25px"))

site <- as.character(fa("link", fill = "	#a56af0", height = "25px"))

review <- tibble(
  
  source <- c("<i>CDC's Introduction to Evaluation With a Focus on Public Health</i>",
                "<i>The Essence of Research in the Counseling Profession</i>",
                "<i>Introduction to Educational and Psychological Measurement Using R</i>"
  ),
  
  section = c(NA,
              "Chapters 1-4 (Part I)",
              "Chapter 1"),
  
  link <- c(
    paste0("[",book,"]",
    "(https://www.cdc.gov/eval/guide/introduction/index.htm){target='_blank'}"
    ),
    paste0("[",site,"]",
    "(https://ebookcentral.proquest.com/lib/wvu/detail.action?docID=4722459){target='_blank'}"
    ),
    paste0("[",book,"]",
    "(https://www.thetaminusb.com/intro-measurement-r/introduction.html){target='_blank'}"
    )
    
  ),
  
  .name_repair = "minimal"
  
)

```
